law.history: Repealed 2004 Ky. Acts ch 189, sec. 31, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 440, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 177. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 37.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Quarantine of dogs in case of excessive damage to livestock, poultry, or domestic game birds -- Destruction of dogs in violation of quarantine.
